Story breakdown since I can read Chinese. 
:The older brother(black hair)  keeps receiving love letter from a stalker which his younger brother(light hair)  brings it to him. The younger also brought a girl who he likes to show off to the older brother although the girl did not like the younger brother. The younger brother is awkward and this ran off to rent CD then the older brother and the girl fuck which later revealed that the reason why the girl comes is to see the older brother which she use the younger brother to do so, she is the older brother's stalker all along. Long story short this is not ntr or cheating
